post.title: MVP Summit
post.content: I know a bunch of people are on campus today for the MVP summit. I’m going to try and hang out as much as I can, but you can also come see me. I’m in Building 22 (close to 40/41 and 42/43/44 where a lot of the developer division is). Send me email, call me at (425)705-6045 or just stop by my office 22/2061.
